title: OSError: [Errno 22] Invalid argument: 'C:\data\predictions\class_probabilities.npy'
body:
**Describe the bug**
I am new to python and using Ludwig. i am just trying your test sample

ludwig train --dataset C:\data\train.csv --config "{input_features: [{name: doc_text, type: text}], output_features: [{name: class, type: category}]}"

Created the model

When i execute

ludwig predict --dataset C:\data\data.csv --model_path "C:\results\experiment_run\model" --output_directory "C:\data\predictions"

Getting below error:

Traceback (most recent call last):
Traceback (most recent call last):
File "C:\Users\Python\Python38\Scripts\ludwig-script.py", line 33, in
sys.exit(load_entry_point('ludwig==0.4', 'console_scripts', 'ludwig')())
File "c:\users\python\python38\lib\site-packages\ludwig\cli.py", line 136, in main
CLI()
File "c:\users\python\python38\lib\site-packages\ludwig\cli.py", line 71, in init
getattr(self, args.command)()
File "c:\users\python\python38\lib\site-packages\ludwig\cli.py", line 79, in predict
predict.cli(sys.argv[2:])
File "c:\users\python\python38\lib\site-packages\ludwig\predict.py", line 268, in cli
predict_cli(**vars(args))
File "c:\users\python\python38\lib\site-packages\ludwig\predict.py", line 112, in predict_cli
model.predict(
File "c:\users\python\python38\lib\site-packages\ludwig\api.py", line 716, in predict
postproc_predictions = postprocess(
File "c:\users\python\python38\lib\site-packages\ludwig\data\postprocessing.py", line 56, in postprocess
_save_as_numpy(predictions, output_directory, saved_keys)
File "c:\users\python\python38\lib\site-packages\ludwig\data\postprocessing.py", line 70, in save_as_numpy
np.save(npy_filename.format(k), v)
File "<array_function internals>", line 5, in save
File "c:\users\python\python38\lib\site-packages\numpy\lib\npyio.py", line 524, in save
file_ctx = open(file, "wb")
OSError: [Errno 22] Invalid argument: 'C:\data\predictions\class_probabilities.npy'

using your training data

doc_text,class
Former president Barack Obama , politics
Juventus hired Cristiano Ronaldo , sport
LeBron James joins the Lakers , spor

**To Reproduce**
I did the same setup as described in your document, but in windows

 

**Environment (please complete the following information):**
 - OS: Windows Server 2019
 
- Python version :3.8.10
- Ludwig version: 0.4
